typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> moviescsv
moviescsv sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	emptyLinesAsHeader: 1,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> moviestable
